name: Snopios, Shade of the Ghoti
effectText: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 Fish monsters from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is banished: You can banish 1 Fish monster from your GY; add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Snopios, Shade of the Ghoti" once per turn.
